account-abstraction-with-biconomy.title: Account Abstraction on Base using Biconomy
account-abstraction-with-biconomy.description: A guide on implementing Account Abstraction into a Base project using Biconomy paymasters, bundlers, and smart accounts.
account-abstraction-with-biconomy.author: Taylor Caldwell

account-abstraction-with-privy-and-base-.title: Account Abstraction: Intro to Privy and the Base Paymaster
account-abstraction-with-privy-and-base-.author: Brian Doyle

advanced-frame-behavior.title: Advanced Frame Behavior
advanced-frame-behavior.description: Make a Farcaster frame that only allows users to access part of the frame after they have completed different actions.
advanced-frame-behavior.author: Brian Doyle

build-with-thirdweb.title: Building an App using thirdweb
build-with-thirdweb.description: A guide on building an NFT gallery app using thirdweb, including steps for creating an NFT collection, minting NFTs, and configuring the app for the Base testnet.
build-with-thirdweb.author: Taylor Caldwell

complex-onchain-nfts.title: Complex Onchain NFTs
complex-onchain-nfts.description: Learn how to make complex nfts that are procedurally generated and have onchain metadata and images.
complex-onchain-nfts.author: Brian Doyle

cross-chain-with-ccip.title: Sending messages and tokens from Base to other chains using Chainlink CCIP
cross-chain-with-ccip.description: A guide on using Chainlink CCIP to perform cross-chain messaging and token transfers from Base Goerli testnet to Optimism Goerli testnet.
cross-chain-with-ccip.author: Taylor Caldwell

cross-chain-with-layerzero.title: Sending messages from Base to other chains using LayerZero V2
cross-chain-with-layerzero.description: A guide on using LayerZero V2 to perform cross-chain messaging from Base Goerli testnet to Optimism Goerli testnet.
cross-chain-with-layerzero.author: Taylor Caldwell

deploy-frame-on-vercel.title: Deploy Frames on Vercel
deploy-frame-on-vercel.description: Learn how to deploy frames using Vercel.
deploy-frame-on-vercel.author: Brian Doyle

deploy-smart-contracts.title: Deploying a Smart Contract using Hardhat
deploy-smart-contracts.description: A guide on deploying a smart contract on the Base test network using Hardhat. Includes instructions for setting up the environment, compiling, and deploying the smart contract.
deploy-smart-contracts.author: Taylor Caldwell

deploy-with-foundry.title: Deploying a Smart Contract using Foundry
deploy-with-foundry.description: A guide on deploying a smart contract on the Base test network using Foundry. Includes instructions for setting up the environment, compiling, and deploying the smart contract.
deploy-with-foundry.author: Tom Vieira

deploy-with-remix.title: Deploying a Smart Contract using Remix
deploy-with-remix.description: A guide on deploying a smart contract on the Base test network using Remix IDE. Includes instructions for setting up the environment, compiling, and deploying the smart contract.
deploy-with-remix.author: Brian Doyle

deploy-with-tenderly.title: Deploying a Smart Contract using Tenderly
deploy-with-tenderly.description: A guide on deploying smart contracts using Tenderly DevNets. This page covers setup, debugging, transaction simulations, and continuous integration for smart contract development on Base Network.
deploy-with-tenderly.author: Tenderly

deploy-with-thirdweb.title: Deploying a Smart Contract using thirdweb
deploy-with-thirdweb.description: A guide on deploying and interacting with smart contracts using the thirdweb CLI and SDK. Includes instructions for project creation, contract deployment on the Base test network.
deploy-with-thirdweb.author: Taylor Caldwell

frame-transactions.title: Frame Transactions
frame-transactions.description: Invoke a wallet transaction from a Farcaster Frame
frame-transactions.author: Brian Doyle

hyperframes.title: HyperFrames
hyperframes.description: Learn how to make cross-linked hyperframes in an organized manner.
hyperframes.author: Brian Doyle

intro-to-foundry-setup.title: Introduction to Foundry: Setting up Foundry with Base
intro-to-foundry-setup.description: Documentation for Foundry, a toolchain for smart contract development. Provides instructions on setting up your development environment to work with Foundry.
intro-to-foundry-setup.author: Brian Doyle

intro-to-foundry-testing.title: Introduction to Foundry: Testing smart contracts
intro-to-foundry-testing.author: Brian Doyle
intro-to-foundry-testing.description: Documentation for Foundry, a toolchain for smart contract development. Learn how to test your smart contracts using Foundry.

intro-to-providers.title: Introduction to Providers
intro-to-providers.description: Learn what providers are and why you need one, and configure several providers and use them to connect to the blockchain.
intro-to-providers.author: Brian Doyle

linked-minting-frame.title: Linked Minting Frame
linked-minting-frame.description: Make a Farcaster frame with an outbound link to a minting website.
linked-minting-frame.author: Brian Doyle

nft-minting-frame.title: Minting an NFT in a Frame
nft-minting-frame.description: Make a Farcaster frame that allows users to mint an NFT on your dime.
nft-minting-frame.author: Brian Doyle

run-a-base-node.title: Running a Base Node
run-a-base-node.description: A guide for setting up and running a Base Node.
run-a-base-node.author: Taylor Caldwell

using-chainlink-price-feeds.title: Accessing real-world data using Chainlink Data Feeds
using-chainlink-price-feeds.description: A guide on using Chainlink Data Feeds to access real-world data, such as asset prices, directly from your smart contracts on the Base testnet.
using-chainlink-price-feeds.author: Taylor Caldwell

using-pyth-price-feeds.title: Accessing real-time asset data using Pyth Price Feeds
using-pyth-price-feeds.description: A guide on using Pyth Price Feeds to access real-time asset data, directly from your smart contracts on the Base testnet.
using-pyth-price-feeds.author: Taylor Caldwell

using-supra-vrf.title: Generating random numbers contracts using Supra dVRF
using-supra-vrf.description: A guide on using Supra dVRF to serve random numbers using an onchain randomness generation mechanism directly within your smart contracts on the Base testnet.
using-supra-vrf.author: Taylor Caldwell
